name: Galactic Heroes
description:
Galactic Heroes is an exciting old-school-style shoot-‘em-up! Pilot a continuously-firing spaceship through enemy airspace, eliminating a barrage of enemy ships while collecting power-ups that change your ship’s firing rate, bullet size, and firing pattern!

HOW TO PLAY:

Move your finger around the screen, and your ship will follow! Firing is continuous and automatic. Temporarily alter your ship’s firing rate, bullet size, and firing pattern by collecting power-ups.

FEATURES:

- Simple, intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Catchy background music!
- Fun sci-fi art and sound effects!
- Six power-up types!
- Seven enemy spaceships!
